title: How to assign different position for each group in a violinplot
Description: The intended visualization is a violin plot displaying the distribution of "total_bill" across the "day" of the week, with data split by "sex", and positioned at specified x-axis locations [1, 2, 4, 6]. The current graph displays a violin for "Fri" that is too narrow, making it difficult to interpret. The desired outcome is for the "Fri" violin to be wider, along with formatted x-axis positions that reflect the specified values.
